display_name: Short Form (36) Health Survey (SF-36): Social functioning subscale score (standardized)
description:
The subscale score is based on 2 items from the Medical Outcomes Study Short Form 36 (SF-36). A high score suggests the participant "performs normal social activities without interference due to physical or emotional problems in the past 4 weeks". [Ware JE and Sherbourne CD, 1992 (PubMed ID: 1593914)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1593914/)

[Search for all SF-36 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/homepap/variables?search=mossf36)
